articles.description: Sue Bird will enter her 21st season with the Seattle Storm.
articles.content:
The crowd won. One more year it is. 
Four-time WNBA champion Sue Bird announced she will return for another season, her 19th playing in the WNBA and 21st since being drafted, in an Instagram post on… [+3567 chars]
